scripts.e2e: pnpm exec cypress run --project apps/modernjs-ssr/dynamic-remote --e2e --config baseUrl=http://localhost:4001 --browser chrome
scripts.e2e:development: pnpm exec cypress open --project apps/modernjs-ssr/dynamic-remote --e2e --config baseUrl=http://localhost:4001 --browser electron
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm exec concurrently "lsof -i :8080 || pnpm --filter modernjs-ssr-dynamic-remote run serve & echo 'done'" "sleep 20 && pnpm --filter modernjs-ssr-dynamic-remote run e2e"
